Location:
- Interior utility/mechanical area; wall-mounted GREE mini-split indoor unit front panel.

Observations:
- Clean, glossy white panel with GREE logo.
- Panel appears seated with a small seam line between sections.
- Adjacent wall is textured paint; standard electrical outlet visible on wall.
- Ceiling/attic area and some rough ductwork visible above unit.

Potential Issues:
- No visible issues.

Recommendations:
- No immediate repairs needed. 
- Schedule routine HVAC maintenance per manufacturer guidelines (filter access/cleaning). 
- Ensure unobstructed access around the unit for service and check that the outlet remains dry and properly wired.
